actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish family and medical leave banks to provide paid leave for employees of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to establish family and medical leave banks for DOD employees.

It requires the forfeited annual leave (i.e., the lost "use it or lose it" annual leave) of an employee to be credited to a family and medical leave bank for use by an eligible employee who experiences a personal or family medical emergency and has exhausted his or her available paid leave.

titles.title: A bill to establish family and medical leave banks to provide paid leave for employees of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
A bill to establish family and medical leave banks to provide paid leave for employees of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
